00043 typedef struct HistoryRecord {

00045     double      kBytesReceived;

00047     float       kBpsDownCur;

00064 class CPreciseRateCounter {
00065     friend class CStatistics;   // for playing dirty tricks to compute running average :P
00066  public:
00067 
00074     CPreciseRateCounter(uint32_t timespan, bool count_average = false)
00075         : m_timespan(timespan), m_total(0), m_rate(0.0), m_max_rate(0.0), m_tmp_sum(0), m_count_average(count_average)
00076         {
00077             if (!count_average) {
00078                 uint64_t cur_time = GetTickCount64();
00079                 uint64_t target_time = cur_time - timespan;
00080                 while (cur_time > target_time) {
00081                     m_tick_history.push_front(cur_time);
00082                     m_byte_history.push_front(0);
00083                     cur_time -= 100;    // default update period
00084                 }
00085                 m_tick_history.push_front(cur_time);
00086             }
00087         }
00088 
00096     void    CalculateRate(uint64_t now);
00097 
00103     double  GetRate()           { wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex); return m_rate; };
00104 
00110     double  GetMaxRate()            { wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex); return m_max_rate; }
00111 
00122     void    SetTimespan(uint32_t timespan)  { wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex); m_timespan = timespan; }
00123 
00127     void    operator+=(uint32_t bytes)  { wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex); m_tmp_sum += bytes; }
00128 
00129  protected:
00130 
00131     std::deque<uint32>  m_byte_history;
00132     std::deque<uint64>  m_tick_history;
00133     uint32_t    m_timespan;
00134     uint32_t    m_total;
00135     double      m_rate;
00136     double      m_max_rate;
00137     uint32_t    m_tmp_sum;
00138     wxMutex     m_mutex;
00139     bool        m_count_average;
00140 };

00327     static  void    AddReceivedBytes(uint32 bytes)
00328         {
00329             if (!s_sinceFirstTransfer->IsRunning()) {
00330                 s_sinceFirstTransfer->StartTimer();
00331             }
00332 
00333             (*s_sessionDownload) += bytes;
00334             (*s_downloadrate) += bytes;
00335             s_totalReceived += bytes;
00336             s_statsNeedSave = true;
00337         }
00338 
00339     static  void    AddSentBytes(uint32 bytes)
00340         {
00341             if (!s_sinceFirstTransfer->IsRunning()) {
00342                 s_sinceFirstTransfer->StartTimer();
00343             }
00344 
00345             (*s_sessionUpload) += bytes;
00346             (*s_uploadrate) += bytes;
00347             s_totalSent += bytes;
00348             s_statsNeedSave = true;
00349         }

00513 class CStatistics {
00514     friend class CStatisticsDlg;    // to access CStatistics::GetTreeRoot()
00515 
00516 private:
00517     CRemoteConnect &m_conn;
00518     static CStatTreeItemBase* s_statTree;
00519     static uint64 s_start_time;
00520     static uint64 s_statData[sdTotalItems];
00521     uint8 average_minutes;
00522 
00523  public:
00524     CStatistics(CRemoteConnect &conn);
00525     ~CStatistics();
00526 
00527     static  uint64  GetUptimeMillis();
00528     static  uint64  GetUptimeSeconds();
00529 
00530     static  uint64  GetTotalSentBytes()         { return s_statData[sdTotalSentBytes]; }
00531     static  double  GetUploadRate()             { return (double)s_statData[sdUpload]; }
00532     static  double  GetUpOverheadRate()         { return (double)s_statData[sdUpOverhead]; }
00533 
00534     static  uint64  GetTotalReceivedBytes()         { return s_statData[sdTotalReceivedBytes]; }
00535     static  double  GetDownloadRate()           { return (double)s_statData[sdDownload]; }
00536     static  double  GetDownOverheadRate()           { return (double)s_statData[sdDownOverhead]; }
00537 
00538     static  uint32  GetWaitingUserCount()           { return s_statData[sdWaitingClients]; }
00539     static  uint32  GetBannedCount()            { return s_statData[sdBannedClients]; }
00540 
00541     static  uint32  GetSharedFileCount()            { return s_statData[sdSharedFileCount]; }
00542 
00543     static  uint32  GetED2KUsers()          { return s_statData[sdED2KUsers]; }
00544     static  uint32  GetKadUsers()           { return s_statData[sdKadUsers]; }
00545     static  uint32  GetED2KFiles()          { return s_statData[sdED2KFiles]; }
00546     static  uint32  GetKadFiles()           { return s_statData[sdKadFiles]; }
00547 
00548     static  bool    IsFirewalledKadUDP()    { return s_statData[sdKadFirewalledUDP] != 0; }
00549     static  uint32  GetKadIndexedSources()  { return s_statData[sdKadIndexedSources]; }
00550     static  uint32  GetKadIndexedKeywords() { return s_statData[sdKadIndexedKeywords]; }
00551     static  uint32  GetKadIndexedNotes()    { return s_statData[sdKadIndexedNotes]; }
00552     static  uint32  GetKadIndexedLoad()     { return s_statData[sdKadIndexedLoad]; }

00555     static  uint32  GetBuddyIP()            { return s_statData[sdBuddyIP]; }
00556     static  uint32  GetBuddyPort()          { return s_statData[sdBuddyPort]; }

00558
